mapper.sql: take_id, order_id, buyer_id, buyer_name, take_name, seller_id, seller_name, shop_id, shop_name, print_count, memo, take_status, created_time, created_name, updated_time, updated_name

where.if: and (a.take_id like concat(concat('%',#{q}),'%') or a.order_id like concat(concat('%',#{q}),'%'))

mapper.select: select take_id from bus_take where take_id like concat(#{prefix},'%') order by take_id desc

select o.take_id as o_take_id, o.order_id as o_order_id, o.buyer_id as o_buyer_id, o.buyer_name as o_buyer_name, o.take_name as o_take_name, o.seller_id as o_seller_id, o.seller_name as o_seller_name, o.shop_id as o_shop_id, o.shop_name as o_shop_name, o.take_status as o_take_status, o.memo as o_memo, o.created_time as o_created_time, o.created_name as o_created_name, o.updated_time as o_updated_time, o.updated_name as o_updated_name, d.goods_id as d_goods_id, d.take_id as d_take_id, d.order_id as d_order_id, d.ori_goods_id as d_ori_goods_id, d.shop_id as d_shop_id, d.line_no as d_line_no, d.goods_name as d_goods_name, d.sku as d_sku, d.qty as d_qty, d.ori_qty as d_ori_qty, d.max_qty as d_max_qty, d.sale_price as d_sale_price, d.enabled as d_enabled, d.memo as d_memo, d.created_time as d_created_time, d.product_type as d_product_type, d.category_code as d_category_code, d.category_name as d_category_name, d.bar_code as d_bar_code, d.brand_code as d_brand_code, d.brand_name as d_brand_name, d.unit as d_unit from bus_take o left join bus_take_goods d on d.take_id = o.take_id where o.take_id = #{takeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by d.sku asc
mapper.insert: insert into bus_take (take_id, order_id, buyer_id, buyer_name, take_name, seller_id, seller_name, shop_id, shop_name, print_count, memo, take_status, created_time, created_name, updated_time, updated_name ) values (#{takeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{takeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{takeStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

buyer_name = #{buyerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update bus_take set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_id = #{buyerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_name = #{buyerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, take_name = #{takeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seller_name = #{sellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_name = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, print_count = #{printCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, take_status = #{takeStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_name = #{createdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_name = #{updatedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where take_id = #{takeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
